title: A proclamation indicting a solemn and publick thanksgiving throughout the kingdom of Scotland to be kept upon the ninth of September next, for His Majesties safe delivery from the late phanatical conspiracy against His Majesty, His Royal Highness, and government.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
